Description:
A large bear appears in front of you as you are going down the falls. Then the bear gets on two legs, and you realize that it is not a bear but a dwarf wearing a bear skin. He approaches you and says,

â€œHey, I'm Grukli, I came here seeking fame and glory but I was wounded in combat and had to rest in this place, I have run out of food and since then I eat what I fish in these waters, but it stinks and tastes horrible!

I've had a stomach ache and hunger for over a week, what I would give to eat something fresh that didn't taste like swamp!"
DescriptionAction: Give him food or at least cure his stomach ache.
